body: Of course, after their friendship has been established and reinforced in the latest chapter, Mai and Eimi must truly put their bond to the test and best the Four Heavenly Secretaries and their leader, Mister CEO Oji-san, to save the OL's of the world! You all think this is hype af, but just wait until the powercreep really sets in, fuckin' hell, these series always end the same way...
my sisters  5 yr   sexy   for machine   fantastic  my sister 5yr   excelent
This actually has a great story (along with phenomenal artwork). I'm impressed.
